mapper.select: SELECT a.field_no AS fieldNo ,a.field_name AS fieldName ,a.field_size AS fieldSize ,a.field_people_number AS fieldPeopleNumber ,a.field_price AS fieldPrice ,b.facility_no AS facilityNo ,b.facility_address AS facilityAddress ,b.facility_notice AS facilityNotice ,b.facility_detail AS facilityDetail ,b.facility_price AS facilityPrice ,b.facility_refund AS facilityRefund ,b.facility_rule AS facilityRule FROM t_facility_field a INNER JOIN t_facility b ON a.facility_no = b.facility_no WHERE field_no = #{fieldNo}

SELECT a.field_name AS fieldName ,a.field_price AS fieldPrice ,b.facility_address AS facilityAddress ,c.calendar_start_time AS calendarStartTime ,c.calendar_end_time AS calendarEndTime ,c.calendar_date AS calendarDate FROM t_facility_field a INNER JOIN t_facility b ON a.facility_no = b.facility_no INNER JOIN t_facility_calendar c ON a.field_no = c.field_no WHERE a.field_no = #{fieldNo} AND c.calendar_no = #{calendarNo}
